SkillLevelDefinition.name: SkillLevelDefinition
SkillLevelDefinition.description: Represents a skill which can be acquired by completing enablement site (myTrailhead) modules.

LearningContent.description: The titles of the Trailhead modules associated to this mapping.

OwnerId.description: The user who owns the Skill Level Definition.

SkillId.description: The skill that this mapping is for.

SkillLevel.description: The level to assign for the skill.
